title: Calculate a Seller Net Sheet
description: A seller is considering an offer and wants to know how much money they will walk away with after all costs. The agent must prepare a seller net sheet.

tasks.description: Gather all inputs: offer price, remaining mortgage balance, commission rate, and estimated closing costs (e.g., title, escrow, taxes).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary financial data.

tasks.description: Calculate the total expenses by summing the mortgage payoff, commissions, and closing costs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the total deductions.

tasks.description: Subtract the total expenses from the offer price to determine the estimated net proceeds for the seller and present it in a formatted sheet.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates an accurate seller net sheet.
